Description: A technique that reuses a model trained on one task for another related task. It preserves knowledge gained while solving one problem and applies it to a different but related problem.
Key Applications: Computer Vision; Natural Language Processing; Speech Recognition

Description: Techniques that combine multiple learning algorithms to obtain better predictive performance than could be obtained from any single algorithm.
Key Applications: Kaggle Competitions; Financial Forecasting; Medical Diagnosis

Description: A type of machine learning where an agent learns to make decisions by taking actions in an environment to maximize a reward signal.
Key Applications: Game Playing; Robotics; Autonomous Vehicles; Resource Management

Description: An approach that trains algorithms across multiple decentralized devices holding local data samples without exchanging them.
Key Applications: Mobile Keyboard Prediction; Healthcare Analytics; IoT Applications

Description: A type of machine learning that can learn new concepts from just a few examples.
Key Applications: Image Classification with Limited Data; Personalization Systems; Low-Resource Languages

Description: A technique that learns representations by contrasting positive pairs against negative pairs.
Key Applications: Computer Vision; Representation Learning; Recommendation Systems

Description: A technique for transferring knowledge from a large model to a smaller one.
Key Applications: Edge Deployment; Mobile Applications; Resource-Constrained Environments

Description: A process where the algorithm can query a user or other information source to label new data points.
Key Applications: Data Labeling; Autonomous Exploration; Annotation Cost Reduction

Description: A sequential design strategy for global optimization of black-box functions.
Key Applications: Neural Architecture Search; Experimental Design; Drug Discovery

Description: Methods and techniques that make AI systems' decisions understandable to humans.
Key Applications: Healthcare; Financial Services; Legal Applications; Regulatory Compliance
